channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Budzyński Maciej - blog

item.title: Forestry and Hugo
item.description: I haven’t written here for a long time, but it’s worth refreshing this blog a bit. Today’s post will be short, and in it, I intend to present the integration of Hugo with the Forestry.io platform.

item.title: Blog based on the Hugo static site generator
item.description: Nowadays, everyone has their own website on the internet. I decided to start a blog based on Hugo technology.
